summary: Small quest mod based upon the tutorial at creationkit; also includes a minor dungeon near Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
This is my attempt at making a quest and dungeon based upon the original tutorial that came out with the CK. The quest itself is Radiant so the target that has the dagger differs from time to time.

There is some voicework (all my own) which is basically a placeholder until I get something more fitting in future quests. 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14884]Url[/url]
author: Roarian
